name: Space Temple
description: You are in a  mission to a space temple, rescue the bots from soul of darkness, a evil villain that controls the robots to be agresive. Help a little hoverbot and a turret to save his friends of evil soul of darkens. Shoot at evil robots to disable them. Note: the game is in beta version (only two levels) it may have 30 in the release an hundreds of levels in the future. To play online version: https://connect.unity.com/mg/fps/untitled-34759         To play old online version: https://connect.unity.com/mg/fps/untitled-9646
